meanings.definition: Doomed to evil, misery, or misfortune
meanings.sent1: The accursed villain met a tragic end in the story.
meanings.sent2: The accursed land was barren and desolate.
meanings.sent3: The accursed cat kept knocking things off the table.
meanings.sent4: The accursed storm wreaked havoc on the small town.
meanings.sent5: The accursed curse haunted the family for generations.

meanings.sent1: The accursed pirate ship was said to bring bad luck.
meanings.sent2: The accursed amulet was buried deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The accursed mirror always showed a distorted reflection.
meanings.sent4: The accursed well was rumored to grant twisted wishes.
meanings.sent5: The accursed ghost haunted the old mansion at night.

meanings.sent1: The accursed dictator oppressed his people mercilessly.
meanings.sent2: The accursed criminal's actions shocked the community.
meanings.sent3: The accursed smell of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent4: The accursed taste of the medicine made her gag.
meanings.sent5: The accursed bully made school a nightmare for many students.
